quest.name: True U
journal: U'odh Nunh suspects his tribeswomen may have had a change of heart.

U'odh Nunh suspects that your efforts on his tribe's behalf may have convinced the distrustful U to lend their strength to your cause. Speak with the huntresses once more to see if you have indeed earned their trust.
The huntresses of the U have expressed a willingness to aid in quelling the beastman threat. Inform U'odh Nunh that his words have proven true.
His tribe won over by your deeds, U'odh Nunh formally pledges his aid to your cause. Return to the Waking Sands and inform Wigstan that your diplomatic mission was a success.
Heartened by your success and the support of the U tribe, Wigstan has found a new sense of purpose. He vows to devote himself wholeheartedly to the suppression of the beastmen.
objectives: Report to Wigstan at the Waking Sands.

dialogue.name: UODHNUN
dialogue.text: The U are a proud people. It is not easy for us to express gratitudeâ”€to outsiders most of all. But those you saved would speak to you. Do them the favor of hearing their words.

dialogue.name: UZOKUA
dialogue.text: You gave me back my strength, and my honor. This is a kindness I must repay. Should you require my aid, you have it.

dialogue.name: UZOKUA
dialogue.text: You gave me back my strength, and my honor. Should you require my aid, you have it.

dialogue.name: UZOKUB
dialogue.text: I thought I was lizard grub for sure until you came to my rescue. What say we crack some lizard skulls together?

dialogue.name: UZOKUB
dialogue.text: Just tell me where I can go to crrrack some lizard skulls!

dialogue.name: UZOKUC
dialogue.text: I don't know your Scions from a hole in the ground, but your friends are my friends, and your enemies are my enemies. Let us crush the beastmen together.

dialogue.name: UZOKUC
dialogue.text: Your friends are my friends, your enemies are my enemies. Let us crush the lizardmen together.

dialogue.name: UZOKUD
dialogue.text: They told me you were strong, but now I have seen with my own eyes. I would be honored to do battle by your side.

dialogue.name: UZOKUD
dialogue.text: You are not of us, yet I trust you as I would a fellow U. I would be honored to do battle by your side.

dialogue.name: UODHNUN
dialogue.text: I trust you have heard the answer you seek. The U do not open their hearts to outsiders easily, but those bonds we do form are that much the stronger.

dialogue.name: UODHNUN
dialogue.text: To protect our freedom, and our newfound friends...the U will fight this battle.

dialogue.name: UODHNUN
dialogue.text: Return and tell your Scion companions that the strength of the U is with them. Go in safety, and know that you will always be welcome here.

dialogue.name: WIGSTAN
dialogue.text: Friend, I had my doubts that even one of your talents could win over the U. Once again, you have proven yourself capable of tasks that would make an ordinary adventurer shrink in fear.

dialogue.name: WIGSTAN
dialogue.text: You have given hope and courage to all here, myself most of all. Rest assured that we shall not squander the opportunity you have given us. For my comrades, for my realm, for a new dawn...I shall stand tall and fight.
